title: Toys and games market : market segmentation by value 2009
summary: This is a bar chart representing Name in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
The highest value at Name Other is 5.98x times more than the lowest value at Plush toys.
min_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Market share in each Name on the y axis.
The maximum Market share 30.5 is found at Name Other and the minimum is found at Plush toys where Name is 5.1.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Name in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
The highest value at Name Other is 5.98x times more than the lowest value at Plush toys.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 7 number of Names.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Name is 25.4.
Name Other is higher than any other Names with value 30.5, followed by Infant/Pre-school toys, and Activity toys. Down to Name Plush toys with the lowest value 5.1.
The highest value 30.5 at Other is almost 2.13 times larger than the average value 14.29.
The Market share is 100.0 if we add up values of all Names.
